overview:
Specializes in salesforce.com Implementation, Support and Training for mid-sized companies and non profits. We are a salesforce.com consultant firm offering CRM professional locally in PA, NY, NJ along with remote admin help nationwide.

Qlikview partner providing Business Intelligence professional Services. QlikView lets you consolidate, search, visualize, and analyze all your data sources for unprecedented business insight. Quick to deploy, easy to use, with a quick time to value.
